articles.content: Data shows Mirae Asset Tax Saver Fund - Reg Growth and IDFC Tax Advantage (ELSS) Fund - Reg Growth have stood atop in all the time-frames chosen. Canara Robeco Equity Tax Saver Fund - Growth and DSP … [+3284 chars]

articles.title: Retail inflation rises to 5.59% in December as against 4.91% in November - Times of India
articles.description: India Business News:  Retail inflation based on consumer price index (CPI) jumped to 5.59 per cent for the month of December, data released by government showed on Wednesd
articles.content: Retail inflation rises to 5.59% in December as against 4.91% in November

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Oil at USD 84 again: Petrol, diesel price on hold for 68th day in a row - Economic Times
articles.description: On November 4, 2021, excise duty on diesel was cut by Rs 10 a litre and that on petrol by Rs 5 per litre, resulting in an equivalent reduction in retail pump rates.
articles.content: Petrol and diesel prices have remained unchanged for 68 days in a row despite a USD 16 swing in international oil prices and global rates again climbing to USD 84 per barrel, oil company data showed.… [+5041 chars]
